name: American Ace Arcade
blurb: Build an 80's inspired retro arcade, and play your favorite games with a big stick, and fat buttons.

rewards.reward: Everyone gets something!  All backers will receive the American Ace desktop wallpaper for you computer.

American Ace Arcade 1" pin-back or magnet-back buttons... your choice!  My son and I will design one of them together. He's about to turn six, so it should be interesting!  (Please add $10 for international shipping.)
American Ace Arcade t-shirt!  Sure to improve your game. Plus, you'll also get the buttons! (Please add $10 for international shipping.)

Complete set of printed plans; blueprints, construction manual, and FULL SIZED templates!  These templates make cutting the panels for your arcade a breeze! (Please add $10 for international shipping.)

All the previous awards!  You're getting the complete set of printed plans, the t-shirt, and the pin-back buttons!  Look great and stay motivated while you build your own arcade! (Please add $15 for international shipping.)

Two full sized side panels with precut t-molding slots, plus the complete set of printed plans.  These sides are a great option for a quick build!  Plus, if you don\u2019t already own the tools, you can save the cost of a router and slot cutter!  (Please add $25 for shipping in the contiguous US.)
All the previous awards!  You're getting the two full sized side panels, the complete set of printed plans, the t-shirt, and the buttons!  (Please add $25 for shipping in the contiguous US.)

DELUXE ACCESSORIES KIT - Everything you need to trim out your new arcade!  Includes: super bright marquee light, t-molding, monitor plexiglass, marquee plexiglass, and custom aluminum marquee retainers! (This reward can be added to the American Ace kit below.)

CONTROL PANEL KIT - Everything you need to build a PC or PS3 compatible arcade controller! Includes: joystick, buttons, predrilled panel, wiring harness,  electronic control board, and USB cable!  (This reward can be added to the American Ace kit below.)

AMERICAN ACE ARTWORK - Personalized just for you!  Add the rank, pilot name, and callsign of your choice to the side panel art and make it your very own!  (This reward can be added to the American Ace kit below.)

AMERICAN ACE KIT - Assembles quickly using included hardware; all you need is a screwdriver.  In less than an hour you're ready to install your favorite gaming system!  NOTE: The deluxe accessories kit, control panel kit, and personalized artwork can all be added to this reward level.  (Please add $50 for shipping in the contiguous US.)

AMERICAN ACE KIT - Assembles quickly using included hardware; all you need is a screwdriver.  In less than an hour you're ready to install your favorite gaming system!  NOTE: The deluxe accessories kit, control panel kit, and personalized artwork can all be added to this reward level.  (Please add $50 for shipping in the contiguous US.)

You've chosen wisely!  You're getting the American Ace kit, the deluxe accessories kit, the complete control panel kit, and the personalized American Ace themed artwork!  PLUS I'm going to also throw in the t-shirt and the buttons!  You'll be looking great and playing your favorite games in an afternoon!  (Please add $50 for shipping in the contiguous US.)
